snippet: Despite great success on grass at the All England Club, Williams is happiest playing on hardcourts, like those at the Western & Southern Open this week and the United States Open later this month.
abstract: Despite great success on grass at the All England Club, Williams is happiest playing on hardcourts, like those at the Western & Southern Open this week and the United States Open later this month.

headline.main: In Ohio, Serena Williams Plays on the Kind of Courts She Loves
